short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Speed up your browser workflow with the most powerful keyboard driven command bar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Spots helps you manage your todos, tabs, bookmarks, and history using the command bar or from the new tab page. Everything you do is saved locally. Nothing leaves your browser. The keyboard first design helps you boost your productivity.

We specifically designed it for those of you who want the best. Any action can be accessed and completed in seconds with the command menu.

...and much more - all for free & totally offline!
